Class ServerThreadForClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerThreadForClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerThreadForClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    When a client connects the server requests a screen name by sending the client the text "SUBMITNAME", and keeps requesting a name until a unique one is received. After a client submits a unique name, the server acknowledges with "NAMEACCEPTED". Then all messages from that client will be broadcast to all other clients that have submitted a unique screen name. The broadcast messages are prefixed with "MESSAGE "
    Author:
    hyejeongkim
